title: Sugarbowl
provenance: Purchase, 1982 (Christie, Manson, Woods Internation, Inc. New York, May 27 1982, lot 64); Museum purchase from General Acquisitions Endowment Fund
description: Globular body with flush-fitting domed cover.  Raised square band encircles body, with shape continued on cover.  Cover with fitted flange closure.  Circular wooden finial.  Circular wooden base plinth.  En suite with 1982-21-1a,b; 2a,b; 4 (same design)
name: Sugarbowl
